content: when i was searching to find the perfect pumpkin hat for my girls there was none that i just loved so i improvised my own design use it however you like share the pattern you can use the items you knit from this pattern in any way that you see fit credit for the pattern would be nice though now available as a ravelry pdf download however i believe the link to the leaf pattern does not work in the pdf so please check the blog post for that link thank you
